channel.title: Owyhee|Elko County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Owyhee|Elko County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: NV-225 North - Brand Inspection Required
item.description: Brand Inspection Required on Livestock Leaving Nevada on NV-225 north.

item.title: NV-225 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-225 north. Distance to Mountain Home (Idaho) and Boise (Idaho). This is the last distance marker northbound on NV-225 in Nevada.

item.title: NV-225 South - Owyhee Road
item.description: NV-225 south at Owyhee Road to Owyhee Airport. Continue on NV-225 for Mountain City and Elko.

item.title: NV-225 North - Entering Owyhee
item.description: Entering Owyhee, Nevada on NV-225 north. Elevation 5400 feet. Owyhee is on the Duck Valley Indian Reservation.
